titleInfo.title: A hybrid system to detect hand orientation orientation in stereo images
Multiple paradigms, comparative studies and hybrid systems: proceedings of an international workshop held on Vlieland, The Netherlands, 1 - 3 June 1994

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Drees, A., Kummert, F., Littmann, E., Posch, S., Ritter, H. & Sagerer, G. (1994). Amsterdam: North Holland Publ. Co.
